tool_description: API to access a wealth of data about whisky auctions, distilleries, and more.
title: Whisky Hunter API

api_list.name: auction_data
api_list.description: List only aggregated data for online auction {slug}.

required_parameters.name: slug
required_parameters.description: The slug of the specific auction.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.whiskyhunter.net/auction_data/catawiki/'
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: auctions_data
api_list.description: List all online auctions aggregated data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.whiskyhunter.net/auctions_data/'
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())
